name: port-plaisance
description: Application de gestion du port de plaisance

scripts.start: cd server && npm install && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config index.js
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.install:prod: npm install && cd server && npm install && node scripts/check-models.js
